name: training-database-project
description: Context-aware reference training database with rich semantic relevance text

scripts.harvest: node harvesting/document-collector.js && node harvesting/citation-extractor.js && node harvesting/context-analyzer.js && node harvesting/relevance-generator.js
scripts.validate: bash -c 'echo "Reference count:" && grep -c "^\[" outputs/TrainingDecisions.txt && echo "Relevance count:" && grep -c "^Relevance:" outputs/TrainingDecisions.txt && echo "Training flag count:" && grep -c "FLAGS\[TRAINING\]" outputs/TrainingDecisions.txt'

author: Fergi
